page.title: 09EDUCATION IN DUNS.
page.content: PRIMARY EDUCATION IN DUNS IS UP TO DATE & CARING IN AN OPEN PLAN SCHOOL. 13 TEACHERS & VISITING TEACHERS OF ART, MUSIC, P.E. & REMEDIAL EDUCATION TEACH 280 CHILDREN. A SPECIAL EDUCATION UNIT IS IN THE SCHOOL. SECONDARY EDUCATION IS TRADITIONAL. BERWICKSHIRE HIGH SCHOOL OPENED IN 1958 & HOUSES 700 PUPILS & 59 TEACHERS.IT SERVES A LARGE AREA OF BERWICKSHIRE. MANY CLUBS, COVERING A WIDE RANGE OF INTERESTS EXISTS WITHIN THE SCHOOL. PUPILS DO COMMUNITY SERVICE & DUKE OF EDINBURGH AWARDS. AN EXCHANGE OF PUPILS & STAFF TAKES PLACE ANUALLY WITH A SCHOOL IN HAMBURG. A SPECIAL EDUCATION UNIT IS IN THE SCHOOL. UNIFORM IS WORN & HOMEWORK GIVEN. PARENTS ADVISORY COUNCIL RAISES FUNDS. THE TOWN MAKES FULL USE OF SCHOOL FACILITIES INCL. SPORTS CENTRE.
